macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: Low Liquidity and Heightened Volatility in Global Markets Post-Holidays
items.summary: Major US and European markets are resuming trading after New Year holidays with reduced liquidity, leading to potential sharp movements from even minor news. Investors are advised to manage risks carefully ahead of full market resumption.

items.title: Key PMI Data Releases Signal Start of New Year Economic Insights
items.summary: PMI indexes from Australia, India, Europe, Germany, Eurozone, and the USA are set for release today, providing the first major indicators of global economic activity pace. These figures could influence investor sentiment, currency rates, and market directions.

items.title: Sparse Major Earnings but Focus on Dividend Announcements
items.summary: No significant corporate earnings reports from large companies today, with major results from tech giants, banks, and energy firms expected later in January. Attention turns to dividend cut-offs from companies like NetApp and AmEx.

items.title: US S&P 500 and European Indices Resume Amid PMI Watch
items.summary: S&P 500 trading resumes with focus on upcoming PMI data and end-month quarterly results; Euro Stoxx 50 sees closed major exchanges but guidance from German/Eurozone PMI, oil prices, and EUR/USD rates.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Tether Adds Nearly $800 Million in Bitcoin, Holdings Exceed 96,000 BTC
items.summary: Tether has significantly increased its Bitcoin reserves by purchasing nearly $800 million worth, pushing its total holdings above 96,000 BTC. This move underscores growing corporate accumulation amid market dynamics.

items.title: Vitalik Buterin Outlines Ethereum's Two Key Goals for 'World Computer' Status
items.summary: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin highlighted substantial technical advancements in 2025 but emphasized two critical goals Ethereum must achieve to fulfill its vision as the 'world computer.' He cautioned against overly focusing on short-term priorities.

items.title: Bitcoin and Altcoin Market Experiences 10-15% Plummet in Recent Reset
items.summary: Recent market analysis indicates a 10-15% drop in Bitcoin and altcoins from January 11th to 23rd, signaling a break from the traditional 4-year cycle and entry into a new reset phase despite prior all-time highs up to $125,000.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: ETRI Releases No-Code Machine Learning Development Tools
items.summary: South Korea's Electronics and Telecommunications Research Institute (ETRI) has released new no-code tools to simplify machine learning development, making it accessible without programming expertise. The tools were announced on January 2, 2026.

items.title: How Generative AI is Changing Education by Outsourcing Knowledge to Big Tech
items.summary: A new article discusses how generative AI is transforming education by shifting knowledge production to big tech companies, raising concerns about dependency and control. Published on January 2, 2026.

items.title: Taylor-based Algorithm Boosts Accuracy for Generative AI's Matrix Exponential
items.summary: Researchers have developed a Taylor-based algorithm that achieves superior accuracy in computing matrix exponentials, a key operation in generative AI models. The breakthrough was reported on January 2, 2026.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: 2026 Shaping Up as Record Year for Cozy Games
items.summary: Content creators are highlighting an unprecedented number of cozy game releases in January 2026, with over 100 cozy games expected throughout the year. Animal Crossing: New Horizons is receiving a surprise update coinciding with Switch 2 launch.

items.title: CES 2026 Coverage to Focus on Cloud Gaming Announcements
items.summary: Gaming media outlets are heading to Las Vegas for CES 2026 to cover cloud gaming developments, with particular focus on potential Nvidia announcements and industry interviews.

items.title: Code Vein 2 and Multiple Titles Launch in January 2026
items.summary: Code Vein 2, Highguard, and Big Hops are among the notable new game releases kicking off 2026.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.

items.title: Sony Honda Mobility Starts Trial Production of AFEELA 1 Electric Vehicle in Ohio
items.summary: Sony Honda Mobility announced on January 2, 2026, the initiation of trial production runs for its first model, AFEELA 1, at Honda's East Liberty Auto Plant, along with a new 'Quality Gate' inspection facility to ensure high standards for its sensor-rich EV.

items.title: US States Implement Major Tech Laws on Privacy, Right-to-Repair, and App Stores Effective January 1, 2026
items.summary: Multiple US states rolled out new tech regulations on January 1, 2026, including right-to-repair laws in Colorado and Washington for consumer electronics, and age verification requirements for app stores in Utah and Texas, amid federal inaction.
